name: Pathway to Chaos
text:
Change 1 of the following monsters you control to the monster listed. If you are changing an Effect Monster, send 1 "Kuriboh" monster from your hand to your Graveyard. This Skill can only be used once per turn and twice per Duel.
● A monster whose original name contains "Gaia the Fierce Knight": "Black Luster Soldier"
● A monster whose original name is "Black Luster Soldier": "Black Luster Soldier - Super Soldier"
